name: Scott Moore
text: Great place with affordable price

name: chris closser
text: Always friendly and knowledgeable!

resp.text: Thanks for giving us such a great review Chris. Come back again soon!

name: Bernadette Mullins
text: Great service.

name: Alex Church
text: The employees are what makes this business  good they are so friendly and helpful they will even help load your lumber in the pouring rain

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Alex. We appreciate your business!

name: Byron strickland
text: Fantastic company that has always accomplished everything we have ever asked of them.  Wonderful family run operation.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Byron!

name: Linda Mott (LMOTT)
text: Nice and clean place of business.

name: Clay Coffey
text: I normally use the local businesses  over the big franchise operations but today was my first and very last time in this place. I asked for 3 items and the guy was trying to sell me things not necessary for my job and insisted on me purchasing them. Yep this is my one and done. Catch y'all at Lowe's or Home Depot

name: Edwin Knowles
text: Good place to find building materials

resp.text: Thanks Edwin! We are glad you decided to shop with us.

name: Antwone Hunt
text: Good

name: Cohen Palmer
text: Usually fast and easy.

name: Ann Legg
text:
Your people were very helpful.
They even used the fork lift to get more product down for us.

name: Steve Russell
text: The crew here goes out of their way to help me and my business.

name: rod rosser
text: Sam helps everyone. Great employee. Deresa ( misspelled maybe) is also a great Smiling helper.

name: David Cunningham
text: They quickly located the tool I needed online and guided me right to it. Thank you.

name: Joseph Woodham
text: A good visit,  employees very helpful with selection of product.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: The pro desk was very helpful in locating product and very friendly.

name: Laroy Kirkland
text: Great people......cece is fantastic service pro

name: Daniel Smith
text: Fast place to unload

name: Frederick Jones
text: This place is the best hands down❤️❤️❤️

name: Captain Tillman
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable

name: d jones
text: Great

name: Walter West
text: 4930 University Square NW, Huntsville, AL 35816

name: Michael Lafreniere
text: Unloaded very quickly,but must be here before 3pmcst or they'll make you wait until the following day. I got here at 2:30 lol

name: Douglas Reeder
text: Great place with great service. Prompt and courteous.

name: Joseph Deloach
text: Did not have what I wanted, and didn't know wind they would have any.

name: Herewego- again
text: Been business with them for years. Good people

name: Matthew Van Norman
text: The customer service provided by Henry at the L & W Supply in Mobile, AL has been beyond exceptional.  He goes above and beyond to take care of his customers. Go see him at their store here in Mobile for any of your drywall, insulation and roofing materials. You will not be disappointed.

name: David Puzar
text: Need to arrive before 8 am to get offloaded quicker.  Public has proirity. Staff was accondating and worked dilegently to do the best they could.

name: Dede Rought
text: Very slow at unloading

name: Deanna Odom
text: I can’t say enough about L&W especially Henry! He was there anytime to help solve any problems and he and his guys made it happen. I wish other sale reps were that concerned about their customers at all businesses! Thanks again Henry

name: Alden Harrison
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Jeremy Jacobs
text: Great place. Quick service. The warehouse guys are friendly and helpful.

name: John Holt
text: Friendly and courteous staff, fast unloading.

name: Lamhro
text: Fast unloading

name: T O
text: Make sure you do not buy more than you need, they charge a 20% restocking fee for any returned product.

name: Jason McDuffie
text: Everyone there was Amazing! Great service, Great Prices!

name: Ben Carithers
text: I need one piece of wood for a shelf & they went above & beyond to pick through all the wood to find me a perfect board. Exceptional people & unbelievably friendly. Go there for your lumber needs...you won't regret it! 👍

name: Wiley Mallett
text: Professional fast

name: Trenton Smith
text: Great service! Customer service was better than anyone in town!

name: LeRoy Perkins
text: Kind of tight turning into the yard with a tractor and trailer, but lots of turning room once inside!

name: Michael Clark
text: Lumber place

name: Patrick Dennis
text: They are always very helpful and professional.  Thanks Bill!

name: Alex G
text: Good service always ready to help

name: Vincent Wilson
text: Unloaded me.fast

name: David Holloway
text: They are always courteous and don't mind loading your truck for you

name: Tony Bili
text: Always have a great experience with these guys

name: David Norris
text: Wayne & Co. are the best in the business!

name: Rodney Griffith
text: Very helpful .

name: William Mathis
text: Good nice people 👍😁
